text:
Some people think the link between effort and results isn’t straightforward. It’s more like a “power law.” This means some efforts can give you way bigger results than others. For instance, Nathan Myhrvold, who used to be the chief tech officer at Microsoft, pointed out that top software developers are way more productive than average ones—not just by a little bit, but by a lot. 🚀

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Certain efforts yield disproportionately greater results, highlighting the importance of focusing on what truly matters.
